ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank Kanyarat Chairaksa for assistance in zebrafish breeding and figure editing; laboratory team of Aquatic Clinic, Department of Food Animal Clinic, Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, Chiang Mai University for the support in fish maintenance; and laboratory team of Research Center for Pharmaceutical Nanotechnology, Chiang Mai University for the support in the extraction of Zingiber ottensii Valeton essential oil.
